name: Peccatum
description:
The World is under control of The Fallen. Everyone is controlled by the Fallen. According to the prophecy, there will be the Chosen One who defeat the Fallen and take over the crown. Will the world be finally saved from The Fallen?

Peccatum is a platformer-action game. The gameplay allow the player to move between platform, player can also attack and jump.  Enemies will patrol around, and can attack the character.
